body:
**Is this a BUG REPORT or FEATURE REQUEST?** (choose one):BUG REPORT


**Kubernetes version** (use `kubectl version`):Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6+", GitVersion:"v1.6.0-alpha.0.2610+281053d66674e8-dirty", GitCommit:"281053d66674e870c93e4627a95689a4018f5f7b", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2016-12-29T06:28:44Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"6+", GitVersion:"v1.6.0-alpha.0.2610+281053d66674e8-dirty", GitCommit:"281053d66674e870c93e4627a95689a4018f5f7b", GitTreeState:"dirty", BuildDate:"2016-12-29T06:28:44Z", GoVersion:"go1.7.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}


**What happened**:
```
# kubectl set selector
panic: runtime error: index out of range

goroutine 1 [running]:
panic(0x145f940, 0xc42000e0c0)
	/home/ubuntu/go/src/runtime/panic.go:500 +0x1a1
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/set.getResourcesAndSelector(0x1ef82d0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xf, 0x0, 0x0, 0xbc6e97, 0xc420097b80, 0xc420432c30)
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/set/set_selector.go:234 +0xd4
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/set.(*SelectorOptions).Complete(0xc4201e2e60, 0x1e8cc40, 0xc42032a840, 0xc42041ed80, 0x1ef82d0, 0x0, 0x0, 0x1e71220, 0xc42002c010, 0x0, ...)
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/set/set_selector.go:137 +0x827
k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/set.NewCmdSelector.func1(0xc42041ed80, 0x1ef82d0, 0x0, 0x0)
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/pkg/kubectl/cmd/set/set_selector.go:83 +0x85
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).execute(0xc42041ed80, 0x1ef82d0, 0x0, 0x0, 0xc42041ed80, 0x1ef82d0)
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra/command.go:603 +0x439
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).ExecuteC(0xc4204a3b00, 0xc4204a7700, 0x1, 0x1)
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra/command.go:689 +0x367
k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra.(*Command).Execute(0xc4204a3b00, 0xc42032a840, 0x1e711e0)
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/vendor/github.com/spf13/cobra/command.go:648 +0x2b
k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubectl/app.Run(0x0, 0x0)
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubectl/app/kubectl.go:38 +0xd5
main.main()
	/home/ubuntu/mygo/src/github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/_output/local/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/cmd/kubectl/kubectl.go:26 +0x22

```

title: fail to run kubectl set selector
